pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tidy Temporal Data Frames and Tools // Provides a 'tbl_ts' class (the 'tsibble') to store and manage temporal-context data in a data-centric format, which is built on top of the 'tibble'. The 'tsibble' aims at manipulating and analysing temporal data in a tidy and modern manner, including easily interpolate missing values, aggregate over calendar periods, performing rolling window calculations, and etc.
